P

PhoneticSearch - Class in <Unnamed>
The main method that implements the Phonetic Search.
PhoneticSearch() - Constructor for class PhoneticSearch
 
preprocessedName - Variable in class Name
The pre-processed name
preprocessName(String) - Method in class SearchEngine
Performs the pre-processing operations on the provided name string as per steps 1-3 in the algorithm:

STEP 1: Filter out non-alphabetical characters using a regular expression.
STEP 2: Convert all characters to upper-case to facilitate case-insensitivity.
STEP 3: Remove all instances of A,E,I,H,O,U,W,Y after the first letter using a regular expression.
printResults(String, ArrayList<String>) - Static method in class PhoneticSearch
Prints the results of the search.
processInput(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class SearchEngine
A private method which takes all of the names and instantiates it as a Name object.
